name: Dartboard Energy
headline: AI Analyst for Electricity Markets
description: Dartboard is an AI Analyst for Electricity Markets, starting with the owners of grid-connected battery projects.

founders.name: Rohun Ati, Founder/CEO
founders.description: CEO at Dartboard Energy. 10th employee and data scientist at Second Measure (YC S15), stayed through its acquisition by Bloomberg. Built the data pipelines for a first-to-market credit card transaction dataset, now powering the Bloomberg Terminal. Later, spent 9 months at AutoGrid in a contract role to see the challenges in clean energy firsthand.

founders.name: Bhasi Nair, Founder
founders.description: Chief Scientist at Dartboard Energy. Experimental physicist (University of Cambridge) with a first-author paper in Nature. Research focused on energy systems.

generated_description:
**Company Summary: Dartboard Energy**

Dartboard Energy is an innovative startup founded in 2024 and currently part of Y Combinator's Batch W25. Operating out of San Francisco, this small but impactful company, with a mere team of two, is on a mission to leverage artificial intelligence for electricity markets. Their primary focus is on helping owners of grid-connected battery projects uncover missed revenue opportunities.

With a clear vision, Dartboard Energy provides sophisticated analytical tools designed specifically to evaluate optimizers and trading strategies for grid-scale batteries. This capability is essential in today’s shifting energy landscape, where maximizing profitability is crucial for battery operators.

The company is backed by Jared Friedman, a notable Group Partner at Y Combinator, indicating strong mentorship and support in their early stages. Their areas of expertise are categorized under artificial intelligence, energy storage, B2B solutions, and analytics—signifying a sharp focus on integrating technology with energy efficiency.

Dartboard Energy's website, [dartboardenergy.com](https://dartboardenergy.com), serves as a hub for information and resources. They also emphasize the importance of collaboration through their "Get in touch" feature, inviting potential clients and partners to connect.

In a world increasingly driven by sustainable energy solutions and advanced analytics, Dartboard Energy positions itself as a critical player in helping battery operators navigate the complexities of energy markets, ensuring they optimize their revenue streams effectively. 

As they continue to grow, Dartboard Energy exemplifies how small teams can harness cutting-edge technology to make a significant impact in the energy sector.
